parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

parameters.name: Content
parameters.description: The message body to be sent to the trigger task.

parameters.name: ExecutionId
parameters.description: The ID of the event-, alert-, or timer-triggered execution.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The type of the trigger. Valid values:

*   Event
*   Alarm
*   Timer
